api/BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory.html.title: Class AppCommandFactory | boose
api/BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory.html.summary: Class AppCommandFactory Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Factory class for creating BOOSE command instances based on command names. Extends the base CommandFactory to provide application-specific command creation. public class AppCommandFactory : CommandFactory, ICommandFactory Inheritance object CommandFactory AppCommandFactory Implements ICommandFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods MakeCommand(string) Creates a command instance based on the provided command name. public override ICommand MakeCommand(string commandName) Parameters commandName string The name of the command to create (case-insensitive). Supported commands: circle, rect, moveto, drawto, clear, tri, reset. Returns ICommand An instance of the corresponding command class, or delegates to the base factory if the command is not recognized.

api/BOOSEapp.BooseCanvas.html.title: Class BooseCanvas | boose
api/BOOSEapp.BooseCanvas.html.summary: Class BooseCanvas Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Implements the ICanvas interface to provide drawing functionality for the BOOSE application. Manages a bitmap canvas with drawing operations including shapes, lines, and text. public class BooseCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object BooseCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors BooseCanvas(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the BooseCanvas class with the specified dimensions. public BooseCanvas(int xsize, int ysize) Parameters xsize int The width of the canvas in pixels. ysize int The height of the canvas in pixels. Properties PenColour Gets or sets the pen color. Currently not implemented. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Gets or sets the X coordinate of the current drawing position. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Gets or sets the Y coordinate of the current drawing position. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle at the current position with the specified radius. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int The radius of the circle in pixels. filled bool If true, the circle is filled; otherwise, only the outline is drawn. Clear() Clears the entire canvas by filling it with white. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current position to the specified coordinates and updates the position. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int The target X coordinate. y int The target Y coordinate. GetPenColour() Gets the current pen color. public Color GetPenColour() Returns Color The current color of the pen. MoveTo(int, int) Moves the drawing position to the specified coordinates without drawing. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int The target X coordinate. y int The target Y coordinate. Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle at the current position with the specified dimensions. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int The width of the rectangle in pixels. height int The height of the rectangle in pixels. filled bool If true, the rectangle is filled; otherwise, only the outline is drawn. Reset() Resets the drawing position to the center of the canvas. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Sets the canvas size. Currently not implemented. public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int The desired width of the canvas. height int The desired height of the canvas. SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the pen color using RGB values. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int The red component (0-255). green int The green component (0-255). blue int The blue component (0-255). Tri(int, int) Draws a triangle at the current position with the specified dimensions. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int The width of the triangle base in pixels. height int The height of the triangle in pixels. WriteText(string) Writes text to the canvas at the top-left area with padding. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string The text string to display on the canvas. getBitmap() Gets the underlying bitmap representation of the canvas. public object getBitmap() Returns object The bitmap containing the current canvas drawing.

api/BOOSEapp.BooseCircle.html.title: Class BooseCircle | boose
api/BOOSEapp.BooseCircle.html.summary: Class BooseCircle Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Command class for drawing circles on the canvas. Extends CommandOneParameter to handle circle drawing operations. public class BooseCircle : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter BooseCircle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors BooseCircle() Initializes a new instance of the BooseCircle class with default values. public BooseCircle() BooseCircle(Canvas, int) Initializes a new instance of the BooseCircle class with a canvas and radius. public BooseCircle(Canvas c, int radius) Parameters c Canvas The canvas on which to draw the circle. radius int The radius of the circle in pixels. Fields radius The radius of the circle to be drawn. public int radius Field Value int Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Validates that the command has exactly one parameter (radius). public override void CheckParameters(string[] Parameters) Parameters Parameters string[] The array of parameter strings to validate. Exceptions CommandException Thrown when the number of parameters is not exactly one. Compile() Compiles the command parameters. Must be called before Execute. public override void Compile() Execute() Executes the circle drawing command. Validates parameters and draws the circle on the canvas. public override void Execute() Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when double parameters are provided (not supported). CommandException Thrown when the radius parameter is negative. Set(StoredProgram, string) Sets the command parameters from the stored program. public override void Set(StoredProgram Program, string Params) Parameters Program StoredProgram The stored program containing variable context. Params string The parameter string to parse.

Exceptions ArgumentException Thrown when the number of parameters is not exactly two. Compile() Compiles the command parameters. Must be called before Execute. public override void Compile() Execute() Executes the triangle drawing command. Validates parameters and draws the triangle on the canvas. public override void Execute() Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when double parameters are provided (not supported). CommandException Thrown when width or height parameters are negative. Set(StoredProgram, string) Sets the command parameters from the stored program. public override void Set(StoredProgram Program, string Params) Parameters Program StoredProgram The stored program containing variable context. Params string The parameter string to parse.

api/BOOSEapp.html.title: Namespace BOOSEapp | boose
api/BOOSEapp.html.summary: Namespace BOOSEapp Classes AppCommandFactory Factory class for creating BOOSE command instances based on command names. Extends the base CommandFactory to provide application-specific command creation. BooseApp Main form class for the BOOSE application. Handles user interface interactions, program parsing, execution, and canvas rendering. BooseCanvas Implements the ICanvas interface to provide drawing functionality for the BOOSE application. Manages a bitmap canvas with drawing operations including shapes, lines, and text. BooseCircle Command class for drawing circles on the canvas. Extends CommandOneParameter to handle circle drawing operations. BooseClear Command class for clearing the canvas. Extends CanvasCommand to handle canvas clearing operations. BooseDrawTo Command class for drawing a line from the current position to specified coordinates. Extends CommandTwoParameters to handle line drawing. BooseMoveto Command class for moving the drawing position without drawing. Extends CommandTwoParameters to handle position movement. BooseReset Command class for resetting the drawing position to the center of the canvas. Extends CanvasCommand to handle position reset operations. BooseTriangle Command class for drawing triangles on the canvas. Extends CommandTwoParameters to handle triangle drawing operations.
